name: Blobwinism
description:
CONTROLS:

Move - A and D

Jump - Spacebar or W

Glide - Spacebar or W

Crush - Left Mouse Click

Blobwinism is a game project developed by Crab Chest Dev Lab for the Discord Jam#5.  Having platformer style mechanics, it makes use of the ability of the slime protagonist of modifying his body parts to overcome the challenges of the environment. Go from a simple blob of gooey cuteness to a biped creature capable of jumping through the obstacles, grab the wooden pieces with your slimy tentacles, break rocks with a gelatinous horn, and much more.

This game was the first Game Jam experience for most of the team, plus we are all students at the start of a game development course in university. Be sure to check out other works from the crew: b-r-a-s-i-l, Chilman, Gwiny and Pancatov.
